column3: In the case where this doesn't hold, this test would wait forever, correct?\n
I can't say what happens if this doesn't hold. Boost for example would throw an exception and thus crash the program.
ACK fab7d14ea5a4305317d66f35beb3225a07823d42\nDespite fail-behavior being unpredictable, having a test is much better than not having one.
